radiographic_examinations.findings: A well-defined, completely suprasellar, homogenously enhancing mass lesion arising from the left lateral aspect of the pituitary infundibulum, abutting the left optic tract and tuber cinereum, measuring approximately 1.1 Ã— 1.2 cm. The pituitary gland was seen separately. The lesion showed intermediate signal intensity on T1 and T2-weighted images.
